items.sentence: Tom has told Mary not to go home by herself.
Tom didn't seem to be much busier than Mary.
Tom didn't need to tell Mary how to do that.
Tom and Mary were planning to sing together.
Neither Tom nor Mary know how to send a fax.
Neither Tom nor Mary is very good at tennis.
It was Tom who told Mary she had to do that.
I didn't know Tom had asked Mary to do that.
Do you think Tom and Mary will eat together?
Both Tom and Mary went home early yesterday.
Tom told Mary he waited for her all morning.
I went to the gym two or three times a week.
Tom is most likely going to buy the red car.
Would you happen to know where Tom was born?
Was Tom the one who taught you how to drive?
Tom's oldest daughter looks a lot like Mary.
Tom didn't tell Mary why he needed her help.
Tom didn't tell Mary he didn't like his job.
Tom didn't know Mary didn't have to do that.
Tom didn't apologize to Mary for doing that.
Tom and Mary wanted to play tennis together.
Tom and Mary live across the street from me.
This morning I saw Tom and Mary in the park.
Perhaps Tom can borrow some money from Mary.
I wonder why Tom thinks Mary has to do that.
I wish Tom hadn't convinced Mary to do that.
I told Tom I didn't know anybody named Mary.
I've just spent three hours studying French.
I wonder whether Tom will sign the contract.
We expect Tom to leave in a couple of hours.
It took Tom three years to write this novel.
I'm pretty sure that's not why Tom did that.
I wonder why Tom is so reluctant to do that.
I wonder why Tom is so desperate to do that.
I wish Tom hadn't waited so long to do that.
I went to Tom's office, but he wasn't there.
I want to know if Tom needs to do that, too.
I understand why Tom didn't want to do that.
How often does Tom eat dinner at your house?
Do you really think Tom will home on Monday?
Do you mean you didn't go swimming with Tom?
Three women are waiting for you at the gate.
I speak French as well as anybody else here.
I lived in Boston before I moved to Chicago.
I learned to ride a bicycle three years ago.
Tom wasn't the only person who was arrested.
Tom wasn't the only one who knew about that.
Tom wasn't the first person to tell me that.
Tom wasn't the first one to get off the bus.
Didn't Tom tell you what he wanted to drink?
